properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where ProcessCommandLine contains "/PhoneDeepLink" and (FolderPath endswith "\\deviceenroller.exe" or ProcessVersionInfoOriginalFileName =~ "deviceenroller.exe")

tags.name: description
tags.value:
Detects the use of the PhoneDeepLink parameter to potentially sideload a DLL file that does not exist. This non-existent DLL file is named "ShellChromeAPI.dll".
Adversaries can drop their own renamed DLL and execute it via DeviceEnroller.exe using this p
